statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 456 AND purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_name) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(CASE WHEN product_name='ProductA' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_productA_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_productA_purchases DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers, purchases
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT template_name, content FROM email_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%offer%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, customers.customer_name FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT template_name, SUBSTRING(content, 1, 50) AS short_content FROM email_templates;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM categories INNER JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, category_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_id = 3 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
